actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to reduce the terms of future members of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to eight years.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act to limit the terms of members of the Federal Reserve Board to eight years (presently 14 years).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to reduce the terms of future members of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to eight years.
